headline: PACCAR Announces Extra Cash Dividend
summary: BELLEVUE, Wash., December 09, 2025--PACCAR Inc’s Board of Directors today declared an extra cash dividend of one dollar and forty cents ($1.40) per share, payable on January 7, 2026, to stockholders of record at the close of business on December 19, 2025.

raw.headline: PACCAR Announces Extra Cash Dividend
raw.summary: BELLEVUE, Wash., December 09, 2025--PACCAR Inc’s Board of Directors today declared an extra cash dividend of one dollar and forty cents ($1.40) per share, payable on January 7, 2026, to stockholders of record at the close of business on December 19, 2025.
